Connect

Meet local developers and technologists. All are welcome, including those with unique backgrounds and from various companies and industries. Learn Learn about a range of technical topics and gain new skills through hands-on workshops, training, events, talks, and meetups, online and in person.

Know More

Our community guidelines

Dataverse is dedicated to providing a harassment-free and inclusive event experience for everyone regardless of gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disabilities, neurodiversity, physical appearance, body size, ethnicity, nationality, race, age, religion, or other protected category.
